name: Klod
description:
Combine bones, shovels,  and other items to navigate the Macabre Necropolis and find as many bones as possible in time. Hieronymous Bonechill has conjured you, the Klod, to do his bidding: Collecting the death force from the bones of those dreary catacombs.

You live, but your chances of survival are faint, you must collect enough bones within 2 minutes to complete the ritual of bone, otherwise, you'll go back to the void from which you were summoned.

POTATO USERS: please make sure to disable lighting if you are encountering performance issues. Good frame rate makes the experience much smoother.

MACOS Chrome users WARNING: A bug in the renderer might cause the first couple seconds of the web version loading to contain strobing lights! Please close your eyes.

Firefox gamepad users: If your game is spinning uncontrollably, hold down R and disable controller input.

Please check the "How to Play" section in the main menu.

BONUS LEVEL EDITOR IN THE DOWNLOADABLE NATIVE VERSION

Source code available at: https://github.com/devildahu/bone-klod
